channel.title: Drop party command 317 PI
channel.description:
hey guys i need a drop party command ive everywere and i can find 1 for delta but not for pi so if u could tell me the command i would be really thankfull
Cheers to the people who reply (:

item.title: Drop party command 317 PI
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

MAX_SIZE = 4
for x in range(0, MAX_SIZE):
     for y in range(0, MAX_SIZE):
          createGroundItem(getRandomDropPartyItem(), playerCurrentX + x, playerCurrentY + y, playerEntity)
def getRandomDropPartyItem(): 
     dropItems = [1050, 1225, 3151]
     return dropItems[random.randint(0, len(dropItems)]

Assuming that getRandomDropPartyItem() retruns an integer ID of a random item that you’d want to be in a drop party, playerCurrentX is the player’s current X coordinate, playerCurrentY is the player’s current Y coordinate, and playerEntity is the play itself (to show ownership of the dropped item) and createGroundItem(ID, X, Y, Owner) creates an item on the ground of the ID at X, Y and is owned by the Owner. The result is a square (4x4) of random drop party items.

Read full topic

item.title: Drop party command 317 PI
item.dc:creator: @Daniel8 Daniel™
item.description:
@Daniel8 wrote:

[quote=“Int Bauk, post:3, topic:405074”][quote author=Daniel™ link=topic=502078.msg3673298#msg3673298 date=1311088680]
if (command.startsWith(“party?”) && playerRights > 2) {
addItem(####,1 );
addItem(####,1 );
addItem(####,1 );
addItem(####,1 );
addItem(####,1 );
addItem(####,1 );
addItem(####,1 );
addItem(####,1 );
addItem(####,1 );
}
[/quote]

LOL?

The method addItem adds an item to a player’s inventory, this isn’t forcing a global object is it?[/quote]
stfu, he can drop them dumbass

Read full topic

}
[/quote]

LOL?

The method addItem adds an item to a player’s inventory, this isn’t forcing a global object is it?[/quote]

No, all that command does is add drop party items to the admin’s inventory so he can drop
